channel.title: NPC Talk
channel.description: How can I make an NPC say something to you in the chatbox when you click "Talk"?

item.title: NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I can’t find where to put it in client.java, can we do teamviewer?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“gangsta tony, post:5, topic:351364”] public void talk2(String text, String text2, int npc) { sendFrame200(4901, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126(text, 4904); sendFrame126(text2, 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(npc, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); }
What else do I edit other then “text” and “text2”?[/quote]You don’t edit anything in the method, and you put the first code I gave you in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(NPCID == NPC ID){ talk2("LINE 1", "LINE 2" NPC ID); NpcDialogueSend = false; }
if it does not work then declare this method:

public void talk2(String text, String text2, int npc) { sendFrame200(4901, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126(text, 4904); sendFrame126(text2, 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(npc, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); }

Read full topic
